original_title: Drenched Part 2: Soaked To The Bone
overview: Feel the sun and the surf flowing over you in a tropical paradise as you follow the erotic exploits of 13 stunning men--including Falcon Lifetime Exclusive Matthew Rush, Falcon legend Chase Hunter, Josh Weston, Tyler Gunn, Carlos Morales and many more--devoted to indulging every hot hard urge. On the beach, in the jungle and in the bedroom you'll experience some of the hottest sexual encounters ever recorded in Part 2 of this sun-soaked, surf-drenched epic. When these Falcon men have had their way, you'll be soaked to the bone!
title: Drenched Part 2: Soaked To The Bone
